about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A bit more about who I am and what I do
about.intro: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience building robust and innovative web solutions. My expertise spans across the entire development stack, from crafting intuitive user interfaces to designing efficient backend systems.
about.education: Currently, I'm pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Université Laval on a part-time basis while working full-time as a developer. I'm passionate about continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technology trends.

highlights: Full Stack Development using Angular and Django

Collaborating with cross-functional teams on innovative solutions
Developed applications using Angular and Spring Boot
Worked with TypeScript and modern web technologies
Contributed to a web application for cybersecurity
Collaborated in an Agile development environment
Assisted students with web development concepts
